title: HDFC Bank Announces 15% Dividend
content: HDFC Bank declared a 15% dividend for shareholders as part of its FY25 results. The bank also reported strong loan growth and improved asset quality.

title: RBI Raises Repo Rate by 25bps
content: The Reserve Bank of India increased the repo rate by 25 basis points to combat persistent inflation pressures in Q4 2025.

title: ICICI Bank Opens 500 New Branches
content: ICICI Bank announced a major expansion plan with 500 new branches across Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities, focusing on rural penetration.

title: Banking Sector NPAs Decline
content: A report from the Finance Ministry revealed that Indian banking sector NPAs have dropped to a five-year low, driven by recovery mechanisms.

title: SEBI Issues New IPO Guidelines
content: SEBI introduced stricter IPO disclosure norms to improve transparency for retail investors starting January 2026.

title: Reliance Retail Q2 Profit Jumps 18%
content: Reliance Retail posted an 18% YoY increase in Q2 profits, driven by robust store expansion and strong e-commerce performance.

title: TCS Wins $1B Global IT Contract
content: Tata Consultancy Services secured a $1 billion multi-year cloud transformation deal from a European banking client.

title: Infosys Expands AI Services
content: Infosys announced a major upgrade to its AI consulting division, targeting BFSI and retail clients globally.

title: Adani Ports Traffic Grows 14%
content: Adani Ports reported 14% growth in cargo traffic for October, driven by strong coal and container movement.

title: Maruti Suzuki Launches New Hybrid SUV
content: Maruti Suzuki unveiled its all-new hybrid SUV featuring best-in-segment mileage and advanced safety systems.

title: RBI Maintains Hawkish Stance
content: The RBI stated in its monetary policy briefing that inflation remains a concern, hinting at further rate hikes if needed.

title: Tech Sector Sees Strong Q3 Hiring
content: Indiaâ€™s technology sector continues to hire aggressively in AI and cloud roles, with over 40,000 openings in Q3.

title: Steel Prices Rise 6%
content: Steel manufacturers raised prices by 6% due to increased input costs and global supply constraints.

title: Oil Prices Fall Below $80
content: Global crude oil prices slipped below $80 as concerns over global demand slowdown intensified.

title: US Fed Holds Interest Rates
content: The US Federal Reserve decided to keep interest rates unchanged while signalling caution about inflation risks.

title: Gold Prices Hit 2-Month High
content: Gold prices in India surged to a two-month high driven by global uncertainty and weaker dollar trends.

title: RBI Introduces New Digital Rupee Rules
content: RBI issued new compliance rules for the Digital Rupee pilot, expanding support to private banks.

title: HDFC Bank Opens 120 New Branches
content: HDFC Bank continues expansion by adding 120 new branches across India to improve financial inclusion.

title: Banking Credit Growth Rises 16%
content: A study by IBA indicated that banking sector credit growth touched 16%, driven by retail and MSME lending.

title: SEBI Investigates Insider Trading Case
content: SEBI launched an investigation into suspected insider trading connected to a major pharma company.

title: Air India Orders 25 New Aircraft
content: Air India announced an order of 25 new aircraft as part of its fleet expansion strategy.

title: SpiceJet Faces Funding Challenges
content: SpiceJet continues facing liquidity issues as lenders demand fresh guarantees for loan restructuring.

title: Coal India Production Up 11%
content: Coal India reported an 11% rise in output during October amid increasing festival season electricity demand.

title: Bajaj Finance Launches New Loan Products
content: Bajaj Finance introduced new pre-approved digital loan offerings for salaried and self-employed individuals.

title: Indian Rupee Slips to 84.1
content: The Indian rupee weakened to 84.1 against the US dollar due to global risk-off sentiment.

title: Paytm Announces New UPI Features
content: Paytm launched advanced UPI security features to reduce fraud and improve transaction safety.

title: Nifty Hits All-Time High
content: The Nifty50 index touched a record high driven by strong banking and IT sector performance.

title: Global Markets Rally on Inflation Cooldown
content: Global stock markets rallied as inflation cooled in major economies including the US and UK.
